competitors.name: Off The Grill by Chef Q

reviews.text: BEST AUTHENTIC PIZZA AROUND! Chicago deep dish pizza is EVERYTHING & priced surprisingly well! We had superior service from Ashton the whole time! FYI, family seating one side & fun adult sports bar on other side. This is as close to what you actually get in Chicago & NY without being there! ENJOY!

Came here on a Sunday. Arrived at 11:50. He had got our food at 1:00 Everybody was in the weeds here. The server was nice but they were definitely understaffed and the kitchen was backed up. The food was relatively warm. The pizza was good. I still can't believe they put a tomato on a hamburger like that. I always tip well regardless of the service. Very disappointed. Maybe being Sunday they were slammed. Cannot recommend.

i‚Äôve eaten here several times and haven‚Äôt had issues . tonight my fianc√© ordered a pizza and they said about 30-35 minutes . at exactly 30 minutes after he called i walked in , paid , and they said it was still in the oven . no problem! a few minutes later a girl walks up to me and says that they can‚Äôt find my pizza so they‚Äôre trying to whip one up ‚Ä¶. what does that mean. extremely confused but i say okay and continue waiting . get home and the pizza is covered in grease and one of the floppiest pizzas ive ever seen . toppings literally sliding off and i can‚Äôt eat it unless i use both hands . never had a problem in the past but after a long day i was really looking forward to pizza and this isn‚Äôt what i expected.

This was our first time at New York Pizza Department and we don't have a single complaint!!! The pizza is awesome, the service is amazing, and the atmosphere is a 10/10. We ordered a half and half pizza and an order of fries, the waitress made sure the fries were at a good temp when they came out so our hangry toddler could dive right in! The pizza came out in a timely manner, our toddler is VERY picky about his cheese pizza and ate 2 whole slices. We will definitely be back!!

New York Pizza Department is hands-down the best spot for affordable, high-quality pizza! The food is always fresh, flavorful, and made with care, and you can really tell they don‚Äôt cut corners on quality.

The staff is incredibly kind and welcoming, and the restaurant is always super clean and well-kept, which makes a big difference. Whether you‚Äôre grabbing a quick slice or sitting down with the family, it‚Äôs a great experience every time.

Delicious food, great people, clean space‚Äîwhat more could you ask for? This place is a local favorite for a reason!

editorial_summary.overview: Pizza joint with a NYC fire & police department theme, offering sizable pies, sandwiches & pastas.

recentReviews.author: Dalton Seratt
recentReviews.text: This was our first time at New York Pizza Department and we don't have a single complaint!!! The pizza is awesome, the service is amazing, and the atmosphere is a 10/10. We ordered a half and half pizza and an order of fries, the waitress made sure the fries were at a good temp when they came out so our hangry toddler could dive right in! The pizza came out in a timely manner, our toddler is VERY picky about his cheese pizza and ate 2 whole slices. We will definitely be back!!

recentReviews.author: karlee ball
recentReviews.text: i‚Äôve eaten here several times and haven‚Äôt had issues . tonight my fianc√© ordered a pizza and they said about 30-35 minutes . at exactly 30 minutes after he called i walked in , paid , and they said it was still in the oven . no problem! a few minutes later a girl walks up to me and says that they can‚Äôt find my pizza so they‚Äôre trying to whip one up ‚Ä¶. what does that mean. extremely confused but i say okay and continue waiting . get home and the pizza is covered in grease and one of the floppiest pizzas ive ever seen . toppings literally sliding off and i can‚Äôt eat it unless i use both hands . never had a problem in the past but after a long day i was really looking forward to pizza and this isn‚Äôt what i expected.

recentReviews.author: Chloe Berry
recentReviews.text:
New York Pizza Department is hands-down the best spot for affordable, high-quality pizza! The food is always fresh, flavorful, and made with care, and you can really tell they don‚Äôt cut corners on quality.

The staff is incredibly kind and welcoming, and the restaurant is always super clean and well-kept, which makes a big difference. Whether you‚Äôre grabbing a quick slice or sitting down with the family, it‚Äôs a great experience every time.

Delicious food, great people, clean space‚Äîwhat more could you ask for? This place is a local favorite for a reason!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.0/5 rating from 5 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the authentic Chicago deep dish pizza that is as close to what you get in Chicago and NY, highlighting its quality and affordability. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility

The service is consistently praised as superior, with staff ensuring a pleasant dining experience, such as keeping fries at the right temperature for children. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant maintains a clean and welcoming atmosphere, which enhances the overall dining experience and makes it a local favorite. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and understaffing issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues due to inconsistent food quality - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, as customers are confused and disappointed by the service experience - social media marketing can improve this area
